channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell EMC Repository Manager (DRM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell EMC Repository Manager (DRM)

item.title: CVE-2020-5315|2024-09-16T16:18:34.603Z -- dell -- dell%20emc%20repository%20manager%20%28drm%29
item.description: Dell EMC Repository Manager (DRM) version 3.2 contains a plain-text password storage vulnerability. Proxy server user password is stored in a plain text in a local database. A local authenticated malicious user with access to the local file system may use the exposed password to access the with privileges of the compromised user.
